76 m paLLan_ kIzAn_um ivan_ nan_marumakan_ mukatti ezuvan_um rA[jEndrasi]MhavaLanAT-TuttaniyUr SrIparAntakaccaturvvEdimaGgalattu irukkum iTaiyan_ moTan_ tIran_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[38*] rAjEndrasiMhavaLa-nATTu miRaikkURRattu miRaiyil irukkum iTaiyan_ kayilAyan_ kArikku perunta-ram olokamArAyan_ tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu ezupattiraNTum tirumantiravolai rAjakEsarinallUr
77 kizavan_ kARAyil eTuttapAtam tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu eTTin_Al ATu irupattu nAlum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ ma[ka]n_ kAri•••1740n_um [u]Tan_- piRanta kayil[A]yan_ pun_n_aiyum kayilAyan_ paTTan_um uTan_piRantAn_ makan_ pun_n_ai kayilAyan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[39*] nittavin_otavaLanATTukkAntAranATTu vicaiyAlaiyaccaturvvEdimaGgalattu irukkum iTaiyan_ maticUtan_ man_Ran_ukku nitta-
78 vin_o[ta]vaLanATTu AvU[r]kkURRattuccempagkuTiccempagkuTai[y]An_ a[mu]tan_ tevan_An_a rAjavidyAdharavizupparaiyan_ tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozipporil [Ut]tai aTTAmal en_Ru [ka]Tava [ti]ruviLakkukku tanta [k]Acil kuTutta kAcu eTTin_A[l] ATu irupattu nAlum sEn[A]pati kuravan_ ulaka[La]ntAn_An_a rAjarAja[ma]hArAjan tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu muppattARin_Al ATu ezupattiraNTum Aka
79 ATu [toNNU]RRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Ri[n_u]kku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTai-kuTi ivan_ [u]Tan_piRanta [ma]ti[cU]tan_ muL[LU]ran_um maticU[ta]n_ colaiyum tan_ ciRRappan_ piTAran_ maticUtan_um•• [ra]n_1741 nArAyaNan_um ATavallA-n_A[l ni]catam aLakkakkaTava ne[y] uzakku ||--[40*] pANDyakul[A]zani[va]LanATTu eri[y]nATTukkaru[vu]ka[l]vallattirukkum iTaiyan_ pan_agkuTi cen[ta]n_ukku peru-ntaram rAjakEsarimUv[e]ntaveLAn_ tan_n_ai [u]TaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozi[p]poril Uttai aTTA[ma]l en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta eru-maiyil [a]Tu-
80 tta [e]rumai [pa]ttin_Al [A]Tu [aRupa]tum [ni]ttavin_otavaLanATTu [A]vUrk-kURRattuccempagkuTicce[mpa]gkuTaiyAn_ amutan_ tevan_An_a rAjavidyAdhara- vizu[p]parai[ya]n_ [ta]n_n_ai [u]TaiyA[r SrI]rAjarAjad[E]var kozipporil [U]tt[ai a]TTAmal en_[Ru] kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta k[Acil] kuTutta kAcu [e]TTin_Al ATu irupattu [n]A[lu]m sEnApati kura[va]n_ ula[ka]Lant[A]n_An_a rAjarAjamahArAjan tiruviLakkukku tanta pa[cu]vil aTutta pacu ARin_Al ATu pan_n_iraNTum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tA-
81 [n_u]m ivan_ aTaikuTi pANDyakulAzani[vaLa]nATTu eri[ynA]TTukka[ru]vu[ka]lval-lattirukkum iTaiyan_ cerumatan_ paTTan_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ vempan_ kecuvan_u[m] ivvU[r] irukkum iTaiyan_ kun_Ran_ ezuvan_um ivvUr iruk-kum i[T]aiyan_ Uran_ [o]rampan_u[m ATava]llAn_Al [ni]catam aLakkakkaTava n[e]y uzakku ||--[41*] pANDyakulAzaniva[La]nATTu kIzcegkiLinATTu magkalanallUr i-rukkum iTaiyan_ Ayiravan_ kaNTan_ukku [u]TaiyAr SrIr[AjarAjI]zvaram uTaiyAr surabhiyil aTutta pacuppatin_An_[Ru]m sE-


Fourth Section.



82 n[A]pati kuravan_ ulakaLantAn_An_a rAjarAjamahArAjan tan_n_ai uTaiyAr [SrI] rAja-rAjadEvar kozippori[l] Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu muppattezum Akappacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Ri-n_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta Ayiravan_ Accan_um Ayiravan_ piTAran_um perappan_ makan_ maRavan_ kaliyan_um ma[Ra]van_ karukkilaiyum ATa-vallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku |||--[42*] [ni]ttavin_o-
83 tavaLan[A]TTu nallUrnATTu rAjarAjapurattu irukkum iTaiyan_ kAri tAzaikku rAja-rAjavANokavaraiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu to[NNU]R-RARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ makan_[page 2-470] tAzai karumANiyum [t]Azai tiruvegkaTamum uTan_piRanta kAri nAr[A]yaNan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney [u]zakku [||--] [43*] tañcAvUr[p]puRam-paTi uyyakkoNTAn_terintatirumañcan_attArveLattu irukkum iTaiyan_
84 araiyan_ para[ma]yan_ukku nittavin_otavaLanATTu AvUrkkURRattuccempagkuTiccem[pa]- gkuTaiyAn_ amutan_ tevan_An_a rAjavidyAdharavizupparaiyan_ tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar cozipporil Utt[ai aT]TAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruvi[La]k-kukku tanta kAcil kuTu[t]ta kAcu eTTin_Al ATu irupattu nAlum sEnApati kuravan_ [u]lakaLa[n]tAn_An_a rAjarAja[ma]hArAjan tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadE[va]r kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu muppattARi-
85 n_Al ATu ezupattira[N]Tum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiru[vi]Lakku on_Rin_u[k]ku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi tañcAvUrppuRa[m]paTi uyyak[k]oNTAn_terinta-tirumañcan_attArveLattu irukkum iTaiyan_ ti••••• kayan_um i[v]- veLattu i[ru]kkum iTaiyan_ curup[pan_] kaNTan_um ivveLattirukkum iTaiyan_ kATan_ [kU]ttan_um 1742[p]ANDyakulA[za]nivaLanATTu eriyanATTukkaruvukalvallat-tirukkum iTaiyan_ pAppAn_ paNaiyan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam [a]LakkakkaTava ney uzakku |||--[44*] rAjarAjavaLanATTukkIzvegkainATTu
86 kSatriyazikhA[ma]Nipurat[tu] irukkum iTaiyan_ mARan_ kuTTattAzikku uTaiyAr SrI-rAjarAjad[E]var tiruviLakkukku tanta pacu[vi]l aTutta pa[cu] muppattu nAlin_Al ATu aRupatteTTum nAkukan_Ru on_Rin_Al A[Tu] on_Rum tiruma[ntirav]olai rAja-kEsari[na]llUr ki[zava]n_ kARAyil [e]TuttapAtam [ti]ruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu nAlin_Al ATu pan_n_i[ra]NTum co[n_a]kan_a cAvUr parañcoti tiruvi-Lakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu aiñcin_Al ATu patin_aiñcum Aka ATu t[o]N-NURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_u[m] iva-
87 n_ aTaikuTi rAjarAjavaLanATTukkIzvegkainATTu kSatriyazikhAmaNipurattu irukkum iTaiyan_ cAttan_ kAriyum ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kampan_ tattaiyam1743 ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kuLirko[yi]l kATan_um ivvUr iruk]kum [i]Taiyan_ [aiyA]- Ra[n_] tAzi[vaTu]kan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLak[ka]kkaTava ney uzakku [||--] [45*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu1744miycegkiLinATTukkiLLikuTi irukkum iTai-[yan_ pA]LUr Ayiravan_ukku poykainATukizavan_ Atittan_ [sU]ryyan_An_a te-n_n_avan_ mUventaveLAn_ tiruviLakkuk[ku] ta-
88 nta kAcil kuTutta kAcu irupatteTTin_Al ATu eNpattu nAlum tirumantiravolai rAja-kEsarinal[lU]r kizava[n_] kARAyil eTuttapAtam tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu nAlin_Al ATTu1745 pan_n_iraNTum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_A[l] tiruvi[La]kku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ makan_ Ayi[ra]van_ aTikaLum uTan_piRanta pALUr1746nilai[yu]n_um pALUr kuru[n]tan_um pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu mIycegkiLinATTukkiLLikuTi irukkum iTai[ya]n_ mazaiyaman_ nakkan_um ATaval-lAn_Al [nicata]-
89 ma a[La]kkakkaTa[va] ney uzakku |||--[46*] rAjarAjavaLanATTu veTTiyArpaTaivITAn_a aiyagkoNTacozanallUr irukkum iTaiyan_ ceri iLagkota[rai]yan_ukku peruntarama vayiri cagkaran_ tan_n_ai uTai[y]Ar SrIrAjarAja[dE]var ko[zippo]- ril Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkuk[ku tanta] kAci[l] ku[Tu]tta kAcu pati-n_ARin_Al ATu nARpatteTTum uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu irupattu nAli[n_A]l ATu [n]ARpatte[T]Tum Aka ATu toN-NURRARin_Al tiru[vi]-
90 Lakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta ceri pU[va]n_um ceri mA[Ra]n_um c[e]ri cUR[Riyum] rAjarAja[va]LanATTu veTTiyAr-paTaivITAn_a jayagkoN[Ta]cozanallUr irukkum i[Tai]yan_ pANTan_ tAzi-yum ATa[va]llAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava n[e]y uzakku ||--[47*] tañ[cAvU]r uLLAlaippANTiveLattu irukkum iTaiyan_ aziyan_ civan_ukku nittavin_o-tavaLanATTu pA[m]puNikkURRattu araicUr araicUruTaiyA[n_] IrAyiravan_ palla-vayan_An_a mummaTicozap[o]can_ tiruviLak-
91 kukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu nARpatteTTum peruntaram rAjarAjavA[Na]kova-raiyan_ tiruviLakkukku ta[n]ta ATTil aTutta ATu nARpatteTTum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiru[vi]Lakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi[page 2-471] ivan_ uTan_piRanta aziyan_ cigkan_um ciRRappan_ kAri [U]rAn_um kAri ci[Ru]puliyum kAri A[c]can_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[48*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTuccuNTai mUlainATTukkoRRama[g]kalattu irukkum iTaiyan_ [pi]TAran_ viti-
92 yan_uk[ku pe]runtaram rAjarAjavANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLakku [ta]nta ATTil aTutta ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ makan_ vitiyan_ pUvaTi[yu]m uTan_piRanta piTAran_ kuTTan_um ciRRappan_ makan_ paramaTi vitiyan_um pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTuccuNTai[mU]lai-nATTukkoRRamagkalattu irukkum iTaiyan_ kaLari eNn_um ATava[l]lAn_Al nica-tama [a]LakkakkaTava ney u[za]kku |||--[49*] [p]ANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu mIypozi[n]ATTu me[Rku]Ti i[ru]-
93 kkum iTaiyan_ UrAn_ cuvaran_ukkupperuntaram nittavin_otavaLanATTuppAmpuNik-[kU]RRattu araicUr araicUruT[ai]yAn_ IrAyiravan_ [pa]llava[ya]n_An_a mummaTi-[c]ozapocan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta UrAn_ kaLariyum nan_marumakan_ maNTai paTTan_um tan_ ciRRappan_ makan_ virun[ta]n_ [k]Ariyum viruntan_ UrAn_um ATavallAn_A[l ni]catam aLa[kkakkaTa]-
94 va ne[y u]zakku |||--[50*] pANDyakulA[za]nivaLanATTu eriynATTukkaruvukalval-lattirukkum iTaiya[n_] nakkan_ kATa[n_u]kku peruntaram rAjarAjavANakovarai-[ya]n_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta nakkan_ pUtiyum tan_ ciRRappan_ makan_ ceruviTai kAriyum ivan_ makan_ kAri ce-ruviTaiyum rAjarAjavaLanATTup[pa]n_[Ri]yUrnATTu[p]perumuLLUr irukkum i-Taiyan_ pukazan_ paTTan_um A[Tava]llAn_A[l nicata]-
95 m aLak[ka]k[ka]Tava ney uzakku ||--[51*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTukkizcUti-nATTu1747 va[TavAyiTa]ttirukkum iTaiyan_ kATan_ ciRukoLLikku uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu ezin_Al ATu pati-n_Alum peruntaram rAjarAjavANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu eNpattiraNTum Aka ATu to[N]NURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_u[m] i[va]n_ [a]TaikuTi ivan_ makan_ ciRukoLLi centan_um uTan_piRanta kATan_ c[en]tan_um [A]Ta[va]-
96 llAn_Al nicatam a[La]kkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[52*] pANDyakulAzanivaLa-nATTukkIzcUtinATTu[k]kuRukkai irukkum iTaiyan_ kArAn_ai nArA[ya]Na-n_ukku uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvi[l] aTutta pacu ARin_Al ATu pan_n_iraNTum peruntaram vANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu muppatum jananAthatterintaparivArattAr tiruviLakkukku ta[n]ta kAci[l] kuTutta kAcu [pa]tin_eTTin_Al ATu aimpattu nA[lu]m [Aka] ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku o[n_Ri]n_u-
97 kku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ makan_ nArAyaNan_ koLiyum uTan_- piRa[n]ta kArAn_ai cURRiyum kArAn_ai nAkan_u[m] ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkak-kaTava ney uzakku ||--[53*] tañcAvUrppuRampaTi zivadA[sa]ncolaiyAn_a rAjarAjabrahmamahArAjanpaTaivITTu irukkum iTaiyan_ kAri m[A]Nikku uTai-yAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu aimpatti-raNTum peruntaram uttaragkuTaiyAn_ kon_ vItiviTagkan_An_a villavan_ mU-ventaveLAn_ tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarA-
98 jadEvar kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu nARpattu nAlum Aka ATu toNNU[R]RARin_Al tiru-viLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tA[n_u]m ivan_ [a]TaikuTi ivan_ tamap[pa]n_ centan_ kAriyum tañcAvUrppuRampaTi An_aikkaTuvArteruvil irukkum iTaiyan_ pAp[p]An_ kaLariyum tañcAvUrppuRampaTi zivadAsa[nco]laiyAn_a rAjarAja-brahmamahArAjan paTaivITTu irukkum iTaiyan_ piTAran_ kUttan_um ippaTai-vITTu irukkum iTai-
99 ya[n_ tA]gki kuTTeRan_um A[Ta]vallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku |||-- [54*] rAjEndrasiMhavaLanATTu miRaikkURRattuttevatAn_am tiru[p]paza[n_a]ttu irukkum iTaiyan_ [va]Tukan_ vempan_ukku sEnApati kuravan_ ulakaLantAn_An_a rAjarAjamahArAjan tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_[Ru] kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta pacu[vi]l [aTutta pa]cu muppattARum[page 2-472] peruntaram rAjarAjavANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil [a]Tutta ATu irupattu nAlin_Al
100 pa[cuppan_]n_i[ra]NTum Akappacu [n]ARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ tan_ perappan_ makan_ vegkaTavan_ irAman_um nan_mAman_ kATan_ [pa]TTan_um kATan_ marutan_um nan_maccun_an_ puRampi [pan_ag]kATan_um [A]TavallAn_Al nicata[m] aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[55*] rAjarAjava[La]nA-TTukkota[N]Tapurattirukkum iTaiyan_ [pUcal] kUtta[n_u]kku ilATamAteviyAr mATAy ivar ezuntaruLuvitta pAcupata[mU]rttikaLukkuttiruviLakkukku tanta eru-maiyil aTutta eru-
101 [mai patin_ai]ñcin_Al ATu to[N]NURum nAkukan_[Ru] on_Rin_Al ATu mUn_Rum [u]TaiyAr SrIrAjarAjIzvaram uTaiyAr surabhiyil aTutta pacu on_Rin_Al ATu iraNTum kan_Ru on_Rin_Al ATu on_Rum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiru-viLakku on_Rin_ukku [iva]n_ tA[n_u]m ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ nan_maccun_an_ kAnan_ [pU]calum pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu cu[N]Tai[mU]lainATTukko[R]Rama[gka]- lattu irukkum iTaiyan_ kAri mILiyum rAjarAja[va]LanATTukk[ota]NTapurattiruk-[ku]m iTaiyan_ muTavan_ ciRRema-
102 n_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kaTukkAri cantiran_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLak-kakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[56*] tañcAvUrppuRampaTi uyyakkoNTAn_terinta-tirumañcan_attArveLattirukkum iTaiyan_ tuTTan_ kArikku uTaiyAr SrIrAja-rAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu irupattu nAlin_Al ATu nAR-patteTTum perunta[ra]m rAjakEsari[mU]ventaveLAn_ tan_n_ai uTaiyAr SrIrA-jarAjadEvar kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta
103 kA[cu] patin_ARin_Al ATu nA[R]patteTTum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta tuTTan_ vem-pan_um ma[ccu]n_an_ kaLari kozampan_um rAjarAjavaLanATTu pun_Ri[l]kU[R]Rattu kaLa-malai irukkum iTaiyan_ [ta]mizan_ [vi]Tattalum tañcAvUrppuRampaTi uyyakko-[N]TAn_teri[n]tatirumañcan_attArveLat[tu] iru[k]kum iTaiyan_ nATTAn_ ku[ruTa]n_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku [||--] [57*] rAja-rAja[va]LanATTu azakiyacozapurattu [i]ruk-
104 kum iT[ai]yan_ maNNi kun_Ran_ukku uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu irupattARin_Al ATu aimpattiraNTum rAjEndrasiMha-vaLanATTu miRaikkURRattu brahmadEyam kAmaravalliccaturvvEdimaGgalattu naTuviru-kkai ceyta koTTaiyUr cuvarapaTTan_ pUvattapaTTan_Ar tammai uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEva[r] kozipporil Uttai aTT[A]mal en_Ru kaTava tiruvi-La[k]kukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu patin_Alin_Al ATu nARpattiraNTum uTai-yAr SrIrAjarAjIzvaram uTai-
105 yAr pa[N]TArattu iTTa akkam aiñcin_A[l] ATu iraNTum Aka ATu to-NNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta maNNi aragkan_um nan_maccun_an_ araiyan_ kaNTan_um rAjarAjavaLanATTu azakiyacozapurattu irukkum iTaiyan_ kuruntan_ picca-n_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kUnan_ ma[N]Niyum ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku |||--[58*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTukkIzcUtinATTu kuRukkaiyirukkum
106 iTaiyan_ mun_aiyan_ araiyan_ukku uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu ARin_Al ATu pan_[n_i]raNTum peruntaram rAjarA-javANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLa[kku]kku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu irupatte-zum [jana]nA[tha]tterintaparivArattAr tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu pan_n_iraNTin_Al ATu muppattARum peruntaram vayiri cagkaran_ tan_[n_ai] uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar kozipporil Uttai a[T]TAmal en_[Ru] kaTava tiruviLakkukku tan[ta kA]cil kuTutta kAcu ezin_Al ATu iru[pa]tton_Rum
107 Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruvi[La]kku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTai-kuTi tan_ ciRRappan_ cAttan_ Accan_um tan_ ciRRappan_ makan_ cantiran_ kaLattUrum pANDyakulAza[niva]LanATTuk[kI]zcUtinATTu kuRukkaiyirukkum iTaiyan_ tAzi ko maTiyum ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ tAzi cAttan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLa kkakkaTava ne[y] uzakku [|||--] [59*] pANDya[ku]lAzani[vaLa]nATTu pun_Ri[R]kUR[page 2-473] Rattu [ma]zaiyUr irukkum iTaiyan_ toLan_ in_i[yA]n_ukku u[Taiy]Ar SrIrA-jarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta pa[cu]vil a-
108 Tutta pacu ARin_Al ATu pan_n_iraNTum peruntaram rAjarAjavA[Na]kovaraiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil [a]Tutta ATu eNpattu nAlum Aka ATu to-NNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku [o]n_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ [a]Tai-kuTi ivan_ makan_ in_iyAn_ vaTukan_um uTan_piRanta toLan_ muzagkan_um tan_ ciRRappan_ vi[Ta]man_ kAriyum tan_ ciRRappan_ makan_ tan_iyan_ Uran_um A-Taval[l]An_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava n[e]y uzakku [||--] [60*] pANDyakulA[za]- niva[La]nATTu mIcegkiLin[ATTuk]kaLattUr irukkum iTaiyan_ cAttan_ [a]ra-gkan_u-
109 kku1748miTur [ki]zAn_ pUti cAttan_ tiruviLak[ku]kku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu irupat-ton_Rin_Al ATu1749ARupattu [mU]n_Rum peru[nta]ram vayiri cagkaran_ tan_n_ai uTai-yAr SrIrAjarAjadEva[r] kozipporil Uttai aTTAmal en_Ru kaTava tiruvi-Lakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu ARin_Al ATu patin_eTTum nittavin_ota-vaLanATTu A[vU]rkkURRattuccem[pa]gkuTiccempa[g]kuTaiyAn_ amutan_1750te-van_n_An_a rAja[vi]dyAdharavizuppar[ai]yan_ tan_n_ai uTaiy[Ar SrI]rAjarAjadEvar kozipporil [U]ttai aTT[A]-


Fifth Section.



110 mal en_Ru kaTava [ti]ru[vi]Lakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu aiñcin_Al ATu [patin_aiñcu]m Aka A[Tu] toNNURRA[Rin_Al tiruviLa]kku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ [a]Tai[kuTi] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu [mIycegki]LinATTu kaLattUr irukkum iTaiyan_ meRkuTaiyAn_ nampan_um i[v]vUr irukkum iTaiyan_ cAttan_ nicca-
111 lum i[v]vUr irukkum iTai[ya]n_ taNakkan_ cURRiyum ivvUr irukkum iTai[ya]n_ karugkuLavan_ cIkiTTan_um [ATaval]lAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ne[y uzakku ||--] [61*] [nitta]vin_otavaLa[nATTu veNNi]kkU[R]Rattu pUva-NUrAkiya a[va]nikEsariccatu[r]vvEdimaGgalattu irukkum iTaiyan_ kuruntan_ cAt-
112 tan_ukku peruntaram nampan_ kUt[t]ATiyA[n_a] jayagkoNTacozabrahma[ma]hArA[ja]n tiru[viLakku]kku tanta [pa]cuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTi[n_A]l tiruviLakku o[n_- Ri]n_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ a[TaikuTi iva]n_uTa[n_pi]Ranta kuru[n]tan_ kAriyum rAjarAjavaLanATTuk[kI]zvegkainATTu malaiyA[N]1751 paT[aivIT]Tu irukkum iTaiyan_
113 pUvaTi picagkan_u[m] ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLa[k]kakkaTava ney [u]zakku ||--[62*] rAjarAjavaLanATTu nA[TTArna]llUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kaNTan_ ai[ya]n_ukku [peruntaram vayalUr kizava ?]n_ tirumalai [veNkATan_] tiru[viLakkukku tanta] pacuvil aTutta pacu nARpattARum nampan_ kUttATiyAn_a jayagkoNTacozabRhmama-hArAjan tiruviLakkukku tanta
114 [pa]cuvi[l] aTutta pacu iraNTum Akappacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Ri-n_ukku [ivan_] tAn_u[m] ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ tan_ ciRRa[ppan_ ai]yARan_ irA[ya]ri[yu]m rAja[rAjavaLanA]TTu [nATTAr nallUr ?] [i]rukkum iTaiyan_ mARan_ pon_n_an_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||-- [63*] rAjarAjavaLanATTu-
115 ccen_n_imagkalakkURRattu olaimagka[la*]ttu irukkum i[Tai]yan_ araiyan_ cAttan_ukku [pe]runtaram karikAlaka[rNNappa]llavaraiyan_ tiruvi[Lakku]kku tanta pa[cuvi]l aTutta pacu nAR[patteTTin_Al ?] [tiruvi]Lakku o[n_Rin_uk]ku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi nan_maccun_an_ kAri cAttan_um tan_ ciRRappan_ ma[ka]n_ paT-Tan_ araiyan_um A-
116 Ta[val]lAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku [||--] [64*] pA[NDya]kulAza[ni]- vaLanATTu eri[y]nATTukka[ruvu]kalvallattirukkum iTaiya[n_] ka[Liyan_] aRi[ñ- ci]kku peruntaram va[ya]lUr kizavan_ tirumalai ve[N]kATan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta [pa]cuvi[l] aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi
[page 2-474]
117 ivan_ [ma]kan_ aRi[ñ]ci tIran_um aRiñci cAttan_um [aRi]ñci piraman_um aRiñci kumara-[n_um] aRiñci kuTTattAzi[yu]m [p]ANDya[ku]lA[zani]vaLanATTu eri[y]nATTu[kka]- ruvu[ka]lvallattirukkum iTaiyan_ tevan_ vIran_um ATavallAn_Al nica[ta]m aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku |||--[65*] rAjEndrasiMhava[La]nATTu poykainA-
118 TTu ga[NDarAdi]tyaccaturvvEdimaGgalattuppiTAkai kulamA[Ni]kkatta irukkum iTaiyan_ [a]Riñcikai maticUtan_ukku peruntaram va[ya]lUr kiza[va]n_ tirumalai veNkATan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku [o]n_ Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta aRiñ[ci]
119 nAka[n_um] rAjEndrasiMhavaLanATTu poykainAT[Tu p]erum[pu]liyUr irukkum iTai-[ya]n_ kAn_Ur puliyan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLa[k]kakkaTa[va] ney uzakku ||--[66*] rAjEndrasiMhavaLanATTu poykainATTu gaNDarAdityaccatu[r]vvEdimaG-galattu irukkum iTaiyan_ mayilai caTaiyan_ukku peruntaram vaya-
120 lUr kizavan_ [tiruma]lai veNkATan_ tiruviLakkukku [ta]nata pacu[vil a]Tutta pacu [n]AR-patteTTi[n_Al ti]ruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ nan_maccun_an_ mArAyan_ mazapATiyum rAjEndrasiMhavaLanATTu poykainATTu gaNDa-rAdityaccaturvvEdimaGgalattuppiTAkai nakkapirA[n_ku]Ricci irukkum iTaiyan_ mutta-
121 zi tirumAliruñco[lai]yum pANDyakulAzanivaLa[n]ATTu Ar[kkATTu]kkURRattu canti-ralekai iruk[ku]m iTaiyan_ kuppai aiyARan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTa-[va] ney uzakku ||--[67*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTupperugko[LU]r irukku[m*] iTaiyan_ viTaman_ kALAmpUvukku peruntaram vayalUr kizavan_ tirumalai veNkATan_ tiruviLakku-
122 [k]ku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiru[viLakku] on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um iva[n_] aTaikuTi ivan_ makan_ kALAmpU viTaman_um pANDyakulAzaniva[La]nATTup-perugkoLUr irukkum iTaiyan_ nakkan_ mARa[n_u]m ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ mUvaraiyan_ cAttan_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ tevan_ oRRiyum ATavallAn_A-
123 l [ni]catam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[68*] rAjarAjavaLa[nATTup]poyiR[kU]- RRattu te[n_]kuTi [iruk]kum iTaiyan_ piTAran_ viLantaikku p[e]runtaram karikAla-kaNNa[p]palla[va]raiyan_ tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTu[t]ta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi [u]Tan_piRanta piTAran_ cAttan_um rAjarAjava-
124 LanATTu magkalavAyil irukkum iTaiyan_ kali[yan_ tU]tuvan_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kaliyan_ Accan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uza-kku ||--[69*] nittavin_ota[va]LanA[TTu] vIrac[o]zavaLanATTucciRuveNNiyil irukkum iTaiyan_ vempan_ kaLarikkupperuntaram arumozip[pa]llavaraiyan_ tiruviLa-
125 kkukku tanta [pa]cuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiru[vi]Lakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_u[m] ivan_ aTaikuTi iva[n_ u]Tan_piRanta ve[m]pan_ vALUrum nittavin_ota-vaLanATTu vIrac[o]zavaLa[nA]TTu[cciRuveNNi ?]yil irukkum iTaiyan_ kecuvan_ veNNiyum ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku [||--70*]
126 arumozitevavaLanATTu nen_malinATTu neTumaNa[l]Akiya matan_amañcariccaturvvedimaGga-lattu irukkum iTai[yan_] pA[cU]r vAsudEvan_ukku uTaiyAr SrIrAja-rAjIzvaram uTaiyAr sura[bhi]yil [aTut]ta pacu [irupattaiñ]cum peruntaram [ni]- ttavin_otamahArAjan tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu irupattu mUn_- Rum Akappa-
127 cu nARpatteTTin_Al [ti]ruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi arumozitevavaLanATTu nen_malinATTu matan_amañcariccaturvvEdimaGgalattu iru-kkum iTaiyan_ okkUr [oma ?]rutan_u[m] ivvU[r iru]kkum iTaiyan_ veNkATan_ vizupparai[ya]n_um ATavallAn_Al nica[ta]m aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[71*] pA[NDya]-
128 [ku]lAzaniva[La]nATTukkIzcUtinATTu nAvalUr irukkum iTaiyan_ nAkan_ caTaiya-n_ukku uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjadEvar tiruviLakkukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu ezupatteTTum peruntara[m] nittavi[n_]ota[mahA]rAja[n ?] tiruviLakkukku tanta [pa]cuvil [a]Tutta pacu on_patin_Al [A]Tu patin_eTTum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al1752

129 [tiru]viLakku on_Rin_ukku iva[n_] tAn_um ivan_ aT[ai]kuTi pANDyakulAzaniva[La]- nATTukkizcUtinATTu1753 nAvalUr irukkum iTaiyan_ kALi cURRiyum ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ [Ara ?]n_ mARan_um ATavallAn_A[l] nicata[m a]LakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[72*] rAjarAjavaLanATTuppulivalakkURRattukka[lai]yan_pATi irukkum1754
130 iTaiyan_ ciRRaman_ pukazan_ukkupperuntaram rAjarAjavANakovaraiyan_ tiruviLak-kukku tanta ATTil aTutta ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku iva-[n_ tA]n_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta ciRRaman_ kuruntan_um ATavallA-n_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ne-
131 [y u]zakku ||--[73*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu eriynATTu [vi]NNan_eriyAn_a mummaTicozanallUr irukkum iTaiyan_ vaTukan_ kuppai[k]kupperuntaram rAjarAja- vANakovar[aiyan_ tiru]viLak[ku]k[ku] tanta ATTil1755aTutta [A]Tu aRupatum tañ- cAvUrppuRampaTi rAjavidyAdharapperunteruvil iruk[ku]-
132 m con_akan_ cAvUr parañcoti tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu pan_n_iraNTin_Al ATu muppattARum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku o[n_Ri]n_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu [eriyn]ATTu viNNan_eriyAn_a mummaTicozanallUr irukkum
133 iTaiya[n_] kALi araiyan_um ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ centan_ kATan_um pANDyaku-lAzanivaLanATTu vaTaciRuvAynATTu vALuvamagkalattu irukkum iTaiyan_a kALi muLLiyum ivvUr irukkum iTaiyan_ muLLUr vempan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[74*]
134 rAjarAjavaLanATTuppan_RiyUrnATTupperumuLLUr irukkum iTaiyan_ mARan_ kATan_u-kkuttañcAvUrppuRampaTi rAjavidyAdharapperu[nt]eruvil irukkum con_akan_ cAvUr parañcoti tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu patin_aiñcin_Al ATu nARpattaiñ- cum p[o]ykai[nATu kizava]n_ Adittan sUryyan_An_a ten_-
135 n_avan_ mUventaveLAn_ tiruviLakkukku tanta kAcil kuTutta kAcu patin_ARin_Al ATu nARpat[t]eTTum uTaiyAr SrIrAjarAjIzvaram uTaiyAr paNTArattiTTa kAcu on_- Rin_Al ATu mUn_Rum Aka ATu toNNURRARin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tA[n_um ivan_ aTaikuTi i]van_ nan_mAman_ kATan_ kaNTa-

137 mpan_u[k]kupperuntaram kon_ cURRiyAn_a aru[m]ozippallavaraiyan_1757 tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um ivan_ aTaikuTi ivan_ uTan_piRanta cigkan_a pon_n_an_um A[Ta]vallAn_Al nicatam aLak[kakkaTava] ney uza[k]ku ||--[76*] [rAja]rAjavaLanATTuccen_n_imagka-


Sixth Section.



138 [lak]kURrattukkaN[Ni]kuTi irukkum iTaiyan_ ciRiyAn_ pan_[Rik]kupperuntaram kon_ cURRiyAn_a arumozippallavaraiyan_1758tiruviLakkukku tanta pacuvil aTutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Rin_ukku ivan_ tAn_um i[va]n_ aTai-[kuTi] ivan_ nan_[ma]-
139 [rumaka]n_ pAN[Tan_] civan_um ATavallAn_Al nicatam aLakkakkaTava ney uzakku [||--] [77*] rAjarAjavaLanATTuccen_n_imagkalakkURRattukkaNNi[ku]Ti iruk-kum iTaiyan_ ka[lla]nakkan_ukkupperunta[ram kon_ cURRiyAn_ arum]ozip-pallavar[aiyan_1759 tiruviLakku]kku tanta [pacuvi]-
140 l [a]Tutta pacu nARpatteTTin_Al tiruviLakku on_Ri[n_ukku] ATaval[lAn_A]l nica[tam a]LakkakkaTava ney uzakku ||--[78*] pANDyakulAzanivaLanATTu [mIy]- cegkiLinATTu magkalattu iruk[ku]m iTai[ya]n_ kuruTan_ periyAn_ukku[p]- peruntaram
